config_markup.error_conversionproduct: You must select a product before you can save the A/B test.
config_markup.error_not_published_product: You must select a published product or product variation before you can save the A/B test.

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: Visitor adds the product to the cart

admin.description: These settings are the defaults values used for Commerce KPIs when added to a test.
admin.financialculturepreference: Select which culture to use when saving and viewing financial results

config_markup.conversion_label: Tracks completed orders and calculates the average order totals processed during the test.
config_markup.error_defaultmarketundefined: A preferred market has not been set nor has a default market been defined.
config_markup.error_undefinedmarket: The current preferred market has not been properly defined or has been removed.

averageorder.description: Tests the potential effects of content on the average cart total of participating users. Results: The total represents the average cart total across all visitors that checked out as part of the test.
averageorder.name: Average Order

readonly_markup.conversion_description: Tracks completed orders and calculates the average order totals processed during the test.

config_markup.error_conversionproduct: You must select a product before you can save the A/B test.
config_markup.error_not_published_product: You must select a published product or product variation before you can save the A/B test.

purchaseitem.description: Choose a product for conversion. Results: Views correlate to visitors that viewed the product, while conversions represent purchasing of said product.
purchaseitem.name: Purchase Product
